body: Hi all , Hope my message finds you well , I have this issue of " 1. None of the connected srfData could be matched with the surfaces in the connected HBZones " when visualizing the surface data results. Also when visualizing the results by zone I had the results of roof & floor only , So what should I do to visualize surface data ?  plz find attached the gh file & the epw file  . [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/w9vi0ysetDplkANeyLPcEpdozb4R0DlLmX6iDu-2abLWGVCO6GshZR0vWpnzAGY5hcIJn2Bnhzo8JxC11CPzjlnXuOf3JyJo/surfacedata.png) thank you ,  Mona
